content: this doily has 13 rounds and measures about 8 1/2 across from the corners for the doily pictured i used aunt lydias size 10 metallic thread in the color white/pearl **gauge** rounds 1-4 measure 1 3/4 **finished size** 8 1/2 in diameter **materials** size 10 crochet thread 50 yards 1 75 mm hook yarn needle scissors
